alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:27PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sedgwick County through 500 PM MDT... At 427 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ovid, or 4 miles west of Julesburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Julesburg and Ovid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
